00059 // On calcule la valeur moyenne entre borne_inf et borne_sup du polynome de lagrange de degre 2 :
00060 // - qui vaut 0 en a et en b
00061 // - qui vaut 1 en c
00062 static double integrate_lagrangian_basis(double a, double b, double c, double borne_inf, double borne_sup)
00063 {
00064   double result  = 0.;
00065   double scaling = (c-a)*(c-b);
00066   double dt      = borne_sup-borne_inf;
00067 
00068   double prod = a*b;
00069   double sum  = -0.5*(a+b);
00070 
00071   double tmp_sup = borne_sup*(prod+borne_sup*(borne_sup/3.+sum));
00072   double tmp_inf = borne_inf*(prod+borne_inf*(borne_inf/3.+sum));
00073 
00074   result = tmp_sup-tmp_inf;
00075   result/=(scaling*dt);
00076 
00077   return result;
00078 }

00084 //! Renvoie le nombre de valeurs temporelles a conserver.<br>3 valeurs temporelles : tn-1, tn, tn+1<br>1 valeur de plus pour le fonctionnement des algorithmes de l'implicite
00085 int Schema_Adams_Moulton_order_3::nb_valeurs_temporelles() const
00086 {
00087   return 4 ;
00088 }
00089 
00090 int Schema_Adams_Moulton_order_3::nb_valeurs_passees() const
00091 {
00092   return 1;
00093 }

00095 int Schema_Adams_Moulton_order_3::nb_pas_dt_seuil() const

00097   return 1;

00100 void Schema_Adams_Moulton_order_3::compute_adams_moulton_coefficients(double time_step, const DoubleTab& times) const
00101 {
00102   if (nb_pas_dt()<100 && limpr() && (facteur_securite_pas()>1.0 || facsec_max_>1.0))
00103     {
00104       Cerr << finl;
00105       Cerr << "********************* Warning (printed only on the first 100 time steps) ************************"<< finl;
00106       Cerr << "The Adams Moulton order 3 scheme is recommended with a facsec and facsec_max set to 1.0 or lower."<< finl;
00107       Cerr << "*************************************************************************************************"<< finl;
00108 // See $TRUST_ROOT/tests/Reference/Schema_Adams_Moulton_order_3 test case.
00109     }
00110   assert(times.size_array() == 3); //past, present and future times, stored in ascending order inside "times" table
00111 
00112   if ( adams_moulton_coefficients_.size_array() != 3)
00113     {
00114       adams_moulton_coefficients_.resize(3,Array_base::NOCOPY_NOINIT);
00115     }
00116 
00117   double past_time    = times[0];
00118   double present_time = times[1];
00119   double future_time  = times[2];
00120 
00121   adams_moulton_coefficients_[0] = integrate_lagrangian_basis(present_time,future_time,past_time,present_time,future_time);
00122   adams_moulton_coefficients_[1] = integrate_lagrangian_basis(past_time,future_time,present_time,present_time,future_time);
00123   adams_moulton_coefficients_[2] = 1 -  adams_moulton_coefficients_[1] -  adams_moulton_coefficients_[0];
00124 }
